scripts.build:wasm: WASM_CRATE_DIR=${WASM_CRATE_DIR:-src/wasm/compactor}; cd "$WASM_CRATE_DIR" && pnpm exec wasm-pack build --target bundler --out-dir ./pkg
scripts.build.strict: WASM_CRATE_DIR=${WASM_CRATE_DIR:-src/wasm/compactor}; (command -v wasm-pack >/dev/null 2>&1 && test -f "$WASM_CRATE_DIR/Cargo.toml" && npm run build:wasm || { echo 'Error: wasm build required for deploy. Ensure wasm-pack and Cargo.toml at ' "$WASM_CRATE_DIR"; exit 1; }) && dotenvx run -fk ../.env.keys -f .env --verbose --overload -- astro check && astro build
scripts.build.strict.no.keys: WASM_CRATE_DIR=${WASM_CRATE_DIR:-src/wasm/compactor}; (command -v wasm-pack >/dev/null 2>&1 && test -f "$WASM_CRATE_DIR/Cargo.toml" && npm run build:wasm || { echo 'Error: wasm build required for deploy. Ensure wasm-pack and Cargo.toml at ' "$WASM_CRATE_DIR"; exit 1; }) && dotenvx run -f .env --verbose --overload -- astro build
